SELECT productCode FROM `order_detail` WHERE productCode NOT IN (SELECT productCode FROM product)

SELECT detailproductcode AS productCode
FROM (SELECT temp.*, `product`.`productCode` AS proproductcode, `product`.`costPrice` FROM (SELECT `tmall_order`.`orderCode` AS tmallordercode, `tmall_order`.`buildTime`, `tmall_order`.`payTime`, `order_detail`.`orderCode` AS detailordercode, `order_detail`.`quantity`, `order_detail`.`productCode` AS detailproductcode FROM `tmall_order` LEFT OUTER JOIN `order_detail` ON `tmall_order`.`orderCode` = `order_detail`.`orderCode` UNION SELECT `tmall_order`.`orderCode` AS tmallordercode, `tmall_order`.`buildTime`, `tmall_order`.`payTime`, `order_detail`.`orderCode` AS detailordercode, `order_detail`.`quantity`, `order_detail`.`productCode` AS detailproductcode FROM `tmall_order` RIGHT OUTER JOIN `order_detail` ON `tmall_order`.`orderCode` = `order_detail`.`orderCode`) AS temp LEFT OUTER JOIN `product` ON temp.detailproductcode = `product`.`productCode`) AS temp1 WHERE payTime LIKE CONCAT(#{chooseMonth},'%') AND detailproductcode NOT IN (SELECT productCode FROM product);

SELECT detailproductcode AS productCode
FROM (SELECT temp.*, `product`.`productCode` AS proproductcode, `product`.`costPrice` FROM (SELECT `alipay_order`.`orderCode` AS aliordercode, `alipay_order`.`occuredTime`, `order_detail`.`orderCode` AS detailordercode, `order_detail`.`quantity`, `order_detail`.`productCode` AS detailproductcode FROM `alipay_order` LEFT OUTER JOIN `order_detail` ON `alipay_order`.`orderCode` = `order_detail`.`orderCode` UNION SELECT `alipay_order`.`orderCode` AS aliordercode, `alipay_order`.`occuredTime`, `order_detail`.`orderCode` AS detailordercode, `order_detail`.`quantity`, `order_detail`.`productCode` AS detailproductcode FROM `alipay_order` RIGHT OUTER JOIN `order_detail` ON `alipay_order`.`orderCode` = `order_detail`.`orderCode`) AS temp LEFT OUTER JOIN `product` ON temp.detailproductcode = `product`.`productCode`) AS temp1 WHERE occuredTime LIKE CONCAT(#{chooseMonth},'%') AND detailproductcode NOT IN (SELECT productCode FROM product);
